page.title: 19THE GRAND UNION CANAL H.B.
page.content: The Grand Union Canal is one of the village's main attractions. The canal is three or four feet deep. There are quite a lot of holiday canal barges on it.When the canal barges went through the tunnel the children would lead the horses over the tunnel while the men legged the boat through the tunnel.They would join the horses after they had gone through the tunnel.Now the boats have engines. Most of the water was clean. In some parts you could see the fish from the bank.Now the water is dirty but there are still some small fish in it.
